nameEntry.part: Delta Delta Delta. Canada Gamma Chapter

biogHist.p: The sorority aimed to develop social graces, improve scholarship and otherwise provide a facet of education not available in the classroom, to female students at the University of Alberta. The Canada Gamma Chapter formed the Canada Gamma House Association in 1947 to acquire and manage real estate and personal property for the Chapter. The Canada Gamma Scholarship was endowed by the sale of the Chapter's house and assets.
